String.string: The area is full of lava.
Defeat The Fire Lord Bahaar with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat The Fire Lord Bahaar with a summoned Priest.
Defeat The Fire Lord Bahaar with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat The Fire Lord Bahaar with a summoned Priest.
Use essential and optional consumables before combat.
You can buy these items from the <font color = '#FFFF00'>Training Dungeon Merchant</font> by the entrance to where the Boss is.
The battle against Bahaar has two phases. Beware that Bahaar has a very tricky attack pattern.
Velikâ€™s Sanctum is actually a <font color='#ffe761'>5-person dungeon</font>. (Cannot enter with fewer players)
Destroy the pylons to summon a Lancer or a Priest (not required for a 5-person party).
You can find Divine Pylons on both sides of the entrance. Destroy the pylons from within 10m when needed.
Bahaar is stronger in phase 2. Make sure to check his attack pattern again before the combat.
The dungeon has been cleared. Type <font color='#ffe761'>/reset</font> or use the <font color='#ffe761'>'Reset Instances' button in your Profile (P)</font>.
